content.description:
Fun, right beside the trail, 2-3 min from the parking lot. 

  Start standing matched on the jug on the trail-facing side of the boulder. Traverse the obvious slopey seam useing a low pinch/undercling halfway. Gain the sidepull jugs out left and follow to the easy top.

This thing is small, but also it is right beside the trail. Walk past Cascadia for about 1 minute and it will be beside the trail to your left. So close to the trail that your pad will be bordering the trail itself.  

  This is maybe 3 minutes or so from the parking lot.There may be two or three lines on this block. 

  Side Show is a diagonal block with interesting slanted rail features and slopey holds.Although this thing is really small, it could be fun... No reason not to climb something this close to VT campus! 

  Also, be respectful and please keep all of your climbing junk out of the trail!
